MORE THAN 45 YEARS \nEXPERIENCE OF SUPPLYING \nROAD CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENTS

Founded and established in 1972 by Late Shri Vashrambhai Dodiya, we at Solid hold a prominent identity in Road Construction Equipment manufacturing. By seeking technical updates from global market, we sensed the demands to make our products better with best possible technical changes and worked upon to satisfy the every niche demands. This practice has made us one of the leading and most innovative manufacturers of India. Our team of expert researchers put all their efforts in offering profitable solutions using latest technologies. \n\nWe aim to design and deliver most consumer friendly, innovative yet practical products of Road Construction Equipments. Our range of key products include Asphalt Paver Finishers (having 2.5 meters to 6 meters paving width) and Stationery / Mobile Asphalt Drum Mix Plants (40 TPH to 150 TPH capacities).

Chairman and Founder of Solid that was setup in 1972, shri Hasmukhbhai Dodia is a Commerce Graduate holding post graduation degree in LLB. With 30 years of floor and on field experience, he is the pillar and strength behind the development of industry-centric machines aiming to offer performance essential to the customers. \n\nHe believed in providing the efficient industrial machines like road construction equipments of Asphalt Batch Mix Plant, Asphalt Drum Mix Plant, Asphalt Paver Finisher etc. With latest technology to the customers for simpler and easier tasks.
